message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $8,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. That's still a good value for you, and allows me to get closer to my desired price. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
Bob, I see you're trying to find a way to make this work.  I'm willing to go down to $10,000. This is a fair price for both of us.  Let's close this deal.  I don't want to keep going back and forth.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,200?
